======= Hour Minute + - PLAY december >>>>>>> origin/main
Digital Clock Analog Clock Days Months Pronunciation Directions Multiplication Finding Similar Images Track The Ball Seasons Back Enter the time (HH:MM) Submit Personal Best Current Score Questions Choose the correct time shown in the figure. Memory Game Learn and Play with Numbers Remember the Sequence Keep your eyes peeled! Memorize the order in which the numbers appear. Tap the Buttons Buttons with numbers will appear below. Tap them in the same order as shown. Oops! Mistakes Happen If you tap the wrong button, it will flash red briefly.No worries, try again! Your Score Return to Homepage Try Again Type the digits from beginning to end. Type the digits from end to beginning. Buttons with numbers will appear below. Tap them in the reverse order as shown. Lets Play and Learn Pronunciation! Explore the Images You will see different images displayed on the screen.Each image represents a different word. Choose the Right Pronunciation You will see four buttons with different pronunciations.Select the button that has the correct pronunciation. Get Feedback If you are correct, you will earn points and move on to the next word. If not, do not worry! You can always try again. SUMMER SPRING FALL WINTER -Warmest season of the year 
-Longer days and higher temperatures. -Sunny days 
-Colorful flowers 
-Return of playful animals -Also known as autumn 
-Between summer and winter 
-Trees shed their leaves 
-It is a time of harvest -Coldest season 
-Shorter days 
-Colder temperatures 
-Snowfall and snowman Quiz Result Correct Wrong You have to take the test again. You are pretty good. You have to try little more. You are very good congratulations ! Choose The Similar Image ! Start the Game Press the start button to begin the game. Look at the Picture You will see a picture at the top of the screen. This picture could be an animal, a fruit, a vehicle, or another object. Choose the Correct Option Find the image that best matches the picture above and click that button. Directions
Learn And Play With Quiz ! Start the quiz by pressing the button. You will see images on the screen. Choose the correct direction for the image. At the end of the quiz, you will see your total score.Try to beat your previous score each time you play!
